## Slide with Plot

## Slide with ggplot

```{r layout='Title and Content', ph=officer::ph_location_type(type="body")}
mygg <- ggplot(pressure, aes(x = temperature, y = pressure)) +
  geom_point()
dml(ggobj = mygg)
```
